title: 780: MACRO GURU RAOUL PAL BETTING ON BITCOIN, ETH AND 9 ALTCOINS - HERE’S HIS CURRENT CRYPTO PORTFOLIO!!
description:
Real Vision chief executive Raoul Pal is revealing most of his crypto portfolio for public viewing.

In a new interview with Thinking Crypto, the former Goldman Sachs executive says that he primarily started out as a Bitcoin (BTC) investor then switched most of his BTC into Ethereum (ETH).

Pal says he then built a basket of 10 equally weighted large-cap altcoins.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
